title: Slovenia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to ski down someone's house, redirecting them to their neighbor with the lower post number. You will know which this is.
- Use 2 bees to protect someone, granting them Powerful defense and Hang immunity for this night and the next day.
- Use 3 bees to sting all visitors to someone, poisoning them. This attack is considered a Powerful attack.
- Purchase a bee. (Costs 3 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night.
- You can use 2 abilities per night.
- You may hold up to 3 bees. If you are holding 3 and do not use any, you will instead generate 3 Gold.

desc:
Post 2755
*“Even though the bee is small, there she is on the flower, doing something of value. And the value she creates there contributes to a larger ecosystem of value, in that mountain meadow, in that range of mountains, in the world and even the universe. And can’t you just feel how happy she is?” - Jay Ebben, Painted Hives*
